headline: Build a Stronger 2026 Portfolio With These 5 Dividend Aristocrats
summary: ATO, MDT, PEP, CAT and SPGI stand out as dividend aristocrats for 2026, offering decades of hikes, solid yields and defensive income.

headline: The Best Dividend Stocks for Retirement Portfolios in 2026
summary: Retirement portfolios need growing income that outpaces inflation and safety that lets you sleep at night. The best retirement dividend stocks build reliable income streams that compound for decades. These companies raise dividends through recessions, market crashes, and business disruptions. We ranked them by dividend growth consistency, payout sustainability, and business resilience heading into 2026. ... The Best Dividend Stocks for Retirement Portfolios in 2026

headline: Can Anaergia’s (TSX:ANRG) PepsiCo Biomethane Deal Redefine Its Waste-to-Energy Investment Narrative?
summary: Anaergia Inc., through its subsidiary Anaergia Technologies, LLC, previously signed a contract with PepsiCo Mexico Foods unit Sabritas S. de R.L. de C.V. to supply high-efficiency digestion, biogas conditioning, and upgrading systems that will convert about 50,000 tons of organic residuals per year into carbon-negative biomethane at a Mexican food production facility. The project, expected to be operating before the end of 2026, highlights how Anaergia’s waste-to-energy technology can...
